Edge change ratio for shot-change detection of soccer.mpg:
[11, 14, 95, 385, 386, 388, 390, 525, 533, 535, 542, 546, 547, 548, 549, 551, 552, 553, 554, 555, 558, 559, 560, 561, 563, 564, 565, 566, 567, 569, 655, 666, 687, 688, 691, 692, 693, 694, 697, 698, 699, 700, 702, 703, 704, 705, 706, 708, 709, 710, 711, 712, 714, 723, 724, 728, 734, 738, 744, 745, 780, 799]
